name: pityingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows sadness or sympathy for someone else's unhappiness or difficult situation: They both shook their heads pityingly at the starving dog. Her pityingly superior expression soon changed to one of complete astonishment.
More examplesFewer examplesSeveral drivers smiled pityingly at me as they went past.They looked pityingly at my unfashionable outfit and went off to talk to someone more interesting. His fans tend to look at me pityingly whenever I tell them that I don't know much about his music.
